meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unusual.
meanings.sent1: The unusualnesses of the situation caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the unusualnesses of the new painting in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The party had an unusualnesses about it that made it unforgettable.
meanings.sent4: The unusualnesses of the storm were like nothing we had ever seen before.
meanings.sent5: His outfit had an unusualnesses that made him stand out in the crowd.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed various unusualnesses from around the world.
meanings.sent2: There were many unusualnesses in the book that made it intriguing.
meanings.sent3: The cake's unusualnesses made it a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with unusualnesses that sparked curiosity.
meanings.sent5: The town's annual festival was known for its unusualnesses and surprises.
